metadata.description: The Name of the Load Balancer
The FQDN of the AD Domain created
The name of the Administrator of the new VM and Domain
The password for the Administrator account of the new VM and Domain
The location of resources such as templates and DSC modules that the script is dependent
The location of Skype Software: The Azure storage name
The token to access the storage name location of Skype Software
The name of your AD CS internal CA
The name of your ADFS service eg sts.contoso.com that is present in the SSL certificate
The ip address of your ADFS service eg sts.contoso.com that is present in the SSL certificate
The password of the pfx SSL certificate

settings.commandToExecute: [concat('powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -File WAP-Install.ps1 -DomainName ', parameters('domainName'),' -Username ', parameters('adminUsername'),' -Password ', parameters('adminPassword'),' -CAComputerName ', parameters('ADFS_CA_Name'), ' -Share ', parameters('_SfBshareLocation'),' -sasToken ', parameters('_SfBshareSasToken'), ' -StsServiceName ', parameters('StsServiceName'),' -CertPassword ', parameters('CertPassword'),' -StsServiceIPaddr ', parameters('StsServiceIPaddr'),' -PublicCert ', parameters('PublicCert'))]
